about_the_game:
STEALTH
Approach humans from behind without being noticed and neutralize them with your weapons. Carry the captured human to your bar to use as a source of materials, but be careful not to be seen along the way.

SUPPLY GOODS
Call the merchant and purchase the necessary materials to stock your shop's shelves. The merchant has everything a kitchen needs, from fruits and vegetables to terrifying ingredients that might please various monsters.

CUSTOMERS
Your customers consist of creatures like werewolves and vampires. After long days of working to survive in this grim world, they want to relax in your bar. Keep them satisfied so they don't harm you or your bar.

CASHIER
Collect cash payments from customers and give them the correct change. Be precise with the change because if there’s one thing a vampire loves more than flesh, it’s their money.

NIGHT BAR
Since your customers can only come out at night, your bar is only open at night. Make the most of your days by hunting humans and stocking up for your bar.

short_description: In this fantastical world where creatures and humans coexist, open your own bar. The customers of this bar aren't humans, but creatures. Hunt humans to cook meals. Order ingredients from merchants. Prepare the orders given by your customers. Earn money and develop your bar however you like.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal
